entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 5:55AM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...A Strong Storm Moves Through the Panhandle This Weekend... A gale force low with a significant source of subtropical moisture will enter the Gulf of Alaska Saturday. Latest forecast has sped up the frontal progression through the Panhandle. Heaviest rainfall is expected Saturday afternoon and into the evening. By Sunday, the plume of moisture becomes directed at the NE Gulf

entry.summary: ...HEAT INDEX VALUES BETWEEN 105 AND 109 DEGREES ARE EXPECTED TODAY...
